tweet.text: PUBLIC MEETING • Dec. 7, 2020 at 10am EST Join us for the open session of the Advisory Committee for Historical Diplomatic Documentation (#HAC). To register for this free online event, please send an email to FortJL@state.gov (1/3) https://t.co/KXJ6XLgkue
